## Checklist
- [ ] I have checked existing feature requests
- [ ] I have checked the [roadmap](https://github.com/maiko/sdbx/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md) for planned features
- [ ] This feature would benefit other users, not just my specific use case
- [ ] I am willing to contribute to implementing this feature
